photos.title: Upload photos of your car
photos.subtitle: We will use these photos to estimate the cost of repairs. Please upload at least one photo â€” this helps the system detect damage and determine the required work.

front.label: Front View
front.helper: Upload a clear photo of the front of your car. Make sure the headlights, bumper, hood, and license plate (if any) are visible.

rear.label: Rear View
rear.helper: Upload a clear photo of the rear of your car, taken straight from behind. The rear bumper, trunk/boot, tail lights, and license plate (if any) should be visible.

left.label: Left Side
left.helper: Upload a photo of the left side of your car taken at a slight angle. Try to capture the entire side, from the front fender to the rear fender.

right.label: Right Side
right.helper: Upload a photo of the right side of your car taken at a slight angle, with the whole side clearly visible in the frame.

extra.label: Additional photo
extra.helper: Upload a close-up photo of the damage (optional).

summary.title: Review your information
summary.description: Please make sure that the provided details and uploaded photos are correct.

details.title: Car details
details.description: Providing these details helps AI generate a more accurate estimate.

country.label: Evaluation Country
country.helperText: Select the country where the repair evaluation will be performed.

description.label: Damage context (optional)
description.placeholder: e.g., scratch on the front bumper or dent on the left door

validation.oneImageRequired: Please upload at least one photo.
